help.short: The name of the gallery image definition in which the Image Version resides.
The name of the gallery image version to be deleted.
The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.
The expand expression to apply on the operation.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="additionalReplicaSets">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="summary" identifiers="region">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="policyViolations">
<prop type="array<@UefiKey_read>" name="db">
<prop type="array<@UefiKey_read>" name="dbx">
<prop type="array<@UefiKey_read>" name="kek">
<prop type="array" name="value">
<prop type="array" name="signatureTemplateNames">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">
<prop type="array" name="executedValidations">
<prop type="array" name="platformAttributes" identifiers="name">

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the gallery image definition in which the Image Version resides.
The name of the gallery image version to be deleted.
The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetExtendedLocations" options="target-extended-locations">
<arg type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" options="target-regions">
<arg type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions[].additionalReplicaSets" options="additional-replica-sets">
<arg type="array" var="@EncryptionImages_create.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">
<arg type="array<@UefiKey_create>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.db" options="db">
<arg type="array<@UefiKey_create>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.dbx" options="dbx">
<arg type="array<@UefiKey_create>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.kek" options="kek">
<arg type="array" var="@UefiKey_create.value" options="value">
<arg type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.signatureTemplateNames" options="signature-template-names">
<arg type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.storageProfile.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the gallery image definition in which the Image Version resides.
The name of the gallery image version to be deleted.
The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetExtendedLocations" options="target-extended-locations">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" options="target-regions">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions[].additionalReplicaSets" options="additional-replica-sets">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@EncryptionImages_update.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@UefiKey_update>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.db" options="db">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@UefiKey_update>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.dbx" options="dbx">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@UefiKey_update>" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.additionalSignatures.kek" options="kek">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@UefiKey_update.value" options="value">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.securityProfile.uefiSettings.signatureTemplateNames" options="signature-template-names">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryImageVersion.properties.storageProfile.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">
